title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Housing, Local Government and Heritage
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Housing, Local Government and Heritage 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited housing local government heritage (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage conferred on him - 

(i) 

by or under the provisions of the enactments specified in 
Part 1 of the Schedule, 

(ii) by or under the enactments specified in Part 2 of the 

Schedule, and 

(iii) under the instruments specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Peter Burke, Minister of State at the Department of Housing, 
Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [559] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister housing local government heritage conferred - (i) provision enactment specified part 1 schedule (ii) enactment specified part 2 schedule (iii) instrument specified part 3 schedule delegated peter burke minister state department housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 27th november 2020 559 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: Section 5 of the Local Government (Rates) Act 1970 (No. 2 of 1970)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PART 1 

Section 5 of the Local Government (Rates) Act 1970 (No. 2 of 1970) 

Section 10 of the Local Government (Financial Provisions) Act 1978 (No. 35 

of 1978) 

Sections 28 to 34 of the Local Government Act 1991 (No. 11 of 1991) 

Section 6 (6) of the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1992 (No. 18 of 
1992) 

Section 63 of the Local Government Act 1994 (No. 8 of 1994) 

Sections 2, 6 and 12 of the Local Government Act 1998 (No.16 of 1998) 

Section 56 of the Valuation Act 2001 (No. 13 of 2001) 

The following sections of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001): 

19, 22A, 23, 44, 48, 51, 52, 54, 68, 75, 87, 96, 102, 103, 104, 106, 107, 108, 111, 
115 to 118, 121 to 123, 125, 126, 126C, 126D, 126K, 128, 129C, 129G, 131, 
131A, 133, 134, 134A, 136, 142 to 148, 151, 155, 156, 158, 160, 161, 167, 169, 
171, 174 to 176, 183, 190, 192, 198 to 201, 206, 210, 212 to 214, 221 to 223, 
225, 231, 233, 236 and 237A 

Sections 29(8) and 31 of the Local Government Reform Act 2014 (No. 1 of 
2014) 

Sections 8 and 28(1) of the Harbours Act 2015 (No. 61 of 2015) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [559] 

PART 2 

Foreshore Acts 1933 to 2014 

Building Control Acts 1990 and 2007 

Urban Renewal Act 1998 (No. 27 of 1998), other than Part III 

Housing (Traveller Accommodation) Act 1998 (No. 33 of 1998) 

Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2019, other than Chapter 1 of Part VI 
of the Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) 

Licensing of Indoor Events Act 2003 (No. 15 of 2003) 

Pyrite Resolution Act 2013 (No. 51 of 2013), other than section 11 

Local Government Act 2019 (No. 1 of 2019) 

Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 (No. 24 of 2019) 

PART 3 

European Communities (Environmental Assessment of Certain Plans and 
Programmes) Regulations 2004 to 2011 

European Union (Marine Strategy Framework) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 249 

of 2011) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [559] 5 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

24 November, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [559] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
